plot: *Chosen for 2003 "Our Choice" Canadian Children's Centre literature guide*Shortlisted for the 2004 Snow Willow AwardAlthough Shan cannot see well and is barely an adult, she teams up with her unlikely companions - a madman (a handsome but rather depressed warrior) and a wizard (a well-intentioned but ineffective magician) - to destroy the Firedrake and free the Perinan people. Firedrake is in breadth, scope, and style one of the most ambitious and successful young adult fantasy novels yet written.
